content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command from the user to append a new link to the previously saved language learning resources file using the "append_to_file" command. The user added the link "https://www.nomadicmatt.com/travel-guides/" to the file. Then, the user used the "browse_website" command to search for top things to do in the destination they are interested in on the website "https://www.nomadicmatt.com/travel-guides/".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides destination guides with information on things to see and do, costs, money-saving advice, recommendations on places to stay, suggested restaurants, transportation tips, and safety advice for various types of vacations. The reader can select a country on the map or search for their destination. However, it does not provide specific information on the top things to do in a particular destination. \n \n Links: ["Nomadic Matt\'s Travel Site (https://www.nomadicmatt.com/)", \' (https://www.facebook.com/nomadicmatt)\', \' (https://www.instagram.com/nomadicmatt/)\', \' (https://twitter.com/nomadicmatt)\', \' (https://www.tiktok.com/@nomadicmatt)\']'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "top things to do in [destination]"}}}'}]
"""
